# cmccloudv2_dns_zone (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cmccloudv2_dns_zone" "zone_1" {
    domain = "example.com"
    type   = "primary"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain` (String) The domain of the DNS zone
- `type` (String) The type of the DNS zone. Currently, only `primary` type is supported

### Optional

- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The created time of the DNS zone
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `status` (String) The status of the DNS zone
- `updated_at` (String) The updated time of the DNS zone

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
